 #include <iostream>
    #include <stdio.h>
    #include <algorithm>
    #include <vector>
    #include <math.h>
    using namespace std;
     
     
    int solve(long long a,long long b)
    {
    if(a==1&&b!=1)
    return 0;
    if(a%b==0)
    return 1;
    else
    {
    long long g=__gcd(a,b);
    return solve(g,b/g);
    }
    }	
    int main() {
    int t;
    long long a,b;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
    scanf("%lld %lld",&a,&b);
    long long g=__gcd(a,b);
    if(solve(g,b/g))
    cout<<"Yes\n";
    else
    cout<<"No\n";
    }
    return 0;
    }
